description:
This dashboard provides a resource usage overview of the Thanos components Querier, Query-Frontend, Compacter and Store.

It includes CPU and Memory requests, limits and usage. In addition, the last termination reason is plotted and the cache hit ratio is available.

targets.expr: sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*", resource="cpu"})

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*", resource="cpu"})

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*", resource="memory"})

sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query.*", container!~"query-frontend.*", resource="memory"})

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{pod!~"thanos-query-frontend.*", pod=~"thanos-query-.*"} != 0

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query-frontend.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query-frontend.*", resource="cpu"})

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"query-frontend.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"query-frontend.*", resource="cpu"})

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query-frontend.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"query-frontend.*", resource="memory"})

sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"query-frontend.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"query-frontend.*", resource="memory"})

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{pod=~"thanos-query-frontend.*"} != 0

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring", container=~"compactor.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"compactor.*", resource="cpu"})

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"compactor.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"compactor.*", resource="cpu"})

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring", container=~"compactor.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"compactor.*", resource="memory"})

sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"compactor.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"compactor.*", resource="memory"})

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{pod=~"thanos-compactor.*"} != 0

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring", container=~"storegateway.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"storegateway.*", resource="cpu"})

sum by(container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"storegateway.*"}[$__interval])) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"storegateway.*", resource="cpu"})

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring", container=~"storegateway.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="monitoring", container=~"storegateway.*", resource="memory"})

sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"storegateway.*"}) / sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="monitoring",  container=~"storegateway.*", resource="memory"})

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{pod=~"thanos-storegateway.*"} != 0
rate(thanos_store_index_cache_hits_total[5m])
rate(thanos_bucket_store_cached_series_fetch_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval])

title: Thanos / Overview
